title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: In Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2 and KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), when opening the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars are enabled. It is possible to move the scrollbars around, but they do not have any effect. When opening a small image, such as an icon, the scrollbars are misleading as they do not provide any functionality.
SR:
1. Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2 and KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only).
2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
3. Verify that the scrollbars are enabled.
4. Attempt to move the scrollbars and verify that they do not have any effect.
5. Open a small image, like an icon, and observe that the scrollbars are misleading and do not provide any functionality.
